result.name: Sorghum Whole-genome GBS SNP Genotyping
result.description: A panel made up of of S. bicolor and S. bicolor x S. halepense was whole-genome genotyped using the SNPs produced with Genotyping-by-sequencing NGS technology. The data contains quality metrics; the user can chose to edit quality parameter to suit their research interests.
result.center: CREA Research Center for Cereal and Industrial Crops
